content: Have a look at the “me” in “mentally” and the “I’ll” in “ill.” “This is ME and I’ll keep telling my story, keep listening to other stories, keep healing, healing healing healing healing and healing….” You are evolving and healing is a process, always a process — sometimes to be celebrated, other times to be allowed to rest or to cry. Healing is multi-polar activity. And, with this comment, I am sending a quanta of love within that little green heart symbol I just added to your total.
